articles.title: India reduces HIV-AIDS infection rate by 46 percent - Prensa Latina
articles.description: New Delhi, Dec 2 (Prensa Latina) India reduced the annual rate of HIV infection by 46 percent between 2010 and 2021, compared to the world average of 32 percent, the National AIDS Control Organization (NACO) revealed.
